name: WKApplicationState
desc: The running states of the Watch app.

items.name: case active
items.desc: The Watch app is running in the foreground and currently receiving events.

items.name: case inactive
items.desc: The Watch app is running in the foreground, but is not yet responding to actions from controls or gestures.

items.name: case background
items.desc: The Watch app is running in the background.
